meanings.sent1: She outplodded through the thick mud on her way to school.
meanings.sent2: The tired hiker outplodded along the steep mountain trail.
meanings.sent3: The tortoise outplodded the hare in the race, much to everyone's surprise.
meanings.sent4: Despite the obstacles, she outplodded her way to success.
meanings.sent5: The elephant outplodded through the jungle, leaving deep footprints behind.

meanings.sent1: He outplodded his classmates in completing the tedious assignment.
meanings.sent2: The determined worker outplodded his colleagues in reaching the daily quota.
meanings.sent3: The snail outplodded the ants in their slow race to the finish line.
meanings.sent4: She outplodded her own expectations by finishing the marathon.
meanings.sent5: The old car outplodded the newer models in the endurance test.
